title: Elementary Calculus: An Infinitesimal Approach
description: This first-year calculus book isÂ centered around the use of infinitesimals. It contains all the ordinary calculus topics, including the basic concepts of the derivative, continuity, and the integral, plus traditional limit concepts and approximation problems. Additional subjects include transcendental functions, series, vectors, partial derivatives, and multiple integrals. 2007 edition.
author: H. Jerome Keisler
